Reference

Make

goldfish goldfish-package

goldfish package

make_data() make_data_goldfish()

Create a data object for goldfish models

make_dependent_events() make_dependent_events_goldfish()

Define dependent events for a model

make_global_attribute() make_global_attribute_goldfish()

Define a global time-varying attribute

make_groups_interaction()

To define the second mode of a DyNAM-i model

make_network() make_network_goldfish()

Defining a network with dynamic events

make_nodes() make_nodes_goldfish()

Defining a node set with (dynamic) node attributes.

link_events()

Link dynamic events to a nodeset or a network

Estimate

estimate_dynam() estimate_dynami() estimate_rem()

Estimate a model

set_estimation_opt()

Control Parameters for Estimation

set_preprocessing_opt()

Control Parameters for Preprocessing

as.data.frame(<nodes.goldfish>) as.matrix(<network.goldfish>)

Methods to update a nodes or network object

print(<result.goldfish>) print(<summary.result.goldfish>) print(<nodes.goldfish>) print(<network.goldfish>) print(<dependent.goldfish>) print(<data.goldfish>) print(<preprocessed.goldfish>) print(<estimation_opt.goldfish>) print(<preprocessing_opt.goldfish>)

Methods for goldfish objects.

Diagnostics

logLik(<result.goldfish>)

Extract log-likelihood from a fitted model object

examine_outliers() examine_changepoints()

Diagnostic functions

Data

The package contains several datasets that are used in vignettes to demonstrate features of goldfish.

Fisheries_Treaties_6070 bilatchanges bilatnet contigchanges contignet gdpchanges regchanges sovchanges states

International bilateral fisheries treaties (1960-1970)

RFID_Validity_Study rfid video known.before participants

RFID Validity dataset

Social_Evolution actors calls friendship

Social evolution of a university dormitory cohort

Gather preprocessing

gather_model_data()

Gather model data from a formula
